note:
Glad to be here in many ways. I'm a 75-year-old retired psychiatric social worker, and a retired lawyer.
I'm a long-married former sorta hippie (never very hip... I began gainful employment at 20 and never stopped until retirement.
I used to be really good at quaffing bourbon until I wasn't.
So, I'm on a marijuana maintenance program. Works for me this past 4 years.
I have four children and ten grandchildren. One of them has divorced from her entire family. Other progeny doing well.
